definition: to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the swing model of fish tail fin is established and simplified.
sentences.chinese: 對魚的尾鰭擺動進行了力學建模，並加以簡化。

sentences.english: The windshield wipers swished back and forth monotonously.
sentences.chinese: 擋風玻璃上的雨刷單調地來回擺動，發出颼颼聲。

sentences.english: Tag ! ine restrict swinging of ! oad.
sentences.chinese: 可限制負荷擺動弧度的牽線。

sentences.english: The straight-line pendula type bulk loading conveyor is a high-efficiency continuous conveying device.
sentences.chinese: 直線擺動或散貨裝船機是一種高效連續輸送機械。

sentences.english: Isadora liked to move her arms and legs in very smooth motions.
sentences.chinese: 伊莎多拉喜歡用非常流暢的動作擺動手臂和腿腳。

sentences.english: This puts the swing perpendicular to the wheel and produces the flattest surface.
sentences.chinese: 這使擺動垂直輪和生產平坦的表面。

sentences.english: It shakes its arms like whips.
sentences.chinese: 它像鞭子一樣擺動雙手。
那節拍器擺動着顯示節拍。

sentences.english: Standing at the back of the crowd, we wrapped our arms around each other, swaying to the music.
sentences.chinese: 我們站在人羣的後面，臂挽着臂，隨着樂曲擺動着。

sentences.english: More than a twirling wobble is implied.
sentences.chinese: 超過一跳起擺動是不言而喻的。

sentences.english: The stability of standing and self-excited swing is discussed as example.
sentences.chinese: 以人體的站立穩定性和自激擺動爲例。

sentences.english: The green grass, such as the heart ripple swing with the wind.
sentences.chinese: 岸邊的綠草隨風擺動，如心兒盪漾。

sentences.english: The kidney is in charge of the bones. Teeth are fixed, not to lose.
sentences.chinese: 腎主骨，牙齒固定，不至於擺動脫落。

sentences.english: The slightest wind agitates the leaves of the trees.
sentences.chinese: 極輕的風使樹上的葉子擺動起來。

sentences.english: Finally, she wiggled out from under a heavy blanket and out of the machine.
sentences.chinese: 最後，她從一張厚重毛毯與機器中擺動脫身。

sentences.english: This part might be little tricky, but keep wiggling it out.
sentences.chinese: 可能有些滑，試着擺動着取出。

definition: to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to move as in a dance/to wave (some implement)/to flourish/(of eyes, hands etc) to dance/to flutter
to stretch taut/(of muscles etc) taut/strained/tense
